name: Unlimited Blocks
description:
Unlimited Blocks is a Procedural Generated Level Game

This is an experimental game developed using Construct2. The development was focused on reading and writing the array to randomize level and creating a level editor feature.

If you want to know how to create a game with features like Spelunky's chunking room, level editor, you can get our Construct2 source code just by giving us some tweet or share.


Check for updates and fill your blocks at here:

mojikenstudio.com / Twitter / Facebook

a game by Septian Setyo

Music Soundtrack by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Ouroboros"
